sentences.en: By early December the conference completed a draft Decleration on the Neutrality of Laos.
sentences.cn: 十二月初,会议拟就了一份关于老挝中立宣言的草案.

sentences.en: Enough electrons are present to maintain electrical neutrality.
sentences.cn: 存在着足够多的电子以维持电中性.

sentences.en: He spoke with neutrality.
sentences.cn: 他说话不偏不倚.

sentences.en: I noticed, behind the neutrality of his gaze, a deep weariness.
sentences.cn: 我注意到他不露声色的注视背后藏着深深的厌倦。

sentences.en: In ionic solutions, the condition of electrical neutrality provides such an additional relation too.
sentences.cn: 在离子溶液中, 电中性条件亦提供了这种附加关系式.

sentences.en: It is an identity that revolves around neutrality , and, yes , an awkward tradition of citizens' referendums .
sentences.cn: 这是一个徘徊在中立周围的身份，也是一个对公民公投尴尬的传统。

sentences.en: Marketing neutrality reflects the essential features of marketing, and overcomes above disadvantages.
sentences.cn: 而营销中性体现营销的本质特征, 克服了前者的种种弊端.

sentences.en: Net neutrality, or not?
sentences.cn: 网络中立或不?

sentences.en: She did so with heavy neutrality , recording her objections each time - once but not more.
sentences.cn: 在这方面她能做得恰到好处,每次遇到不满的地方, 她就说出来,但只说一次而已,从不多说.

sentences.en: Six - phase winding, fork connection. Neutrality can be shown or hidden.
sentences.cn: 六相绕组, 叉式连接. 可显示或隐藏中性.

sentences.en: Some of the nations declared neutrality.
sentences.cn: 有的国家宣布中立。

sentences.en: Switzerland declared its neutrality.
sentences.cn: 瑞士宣布中立.

sentences.en: The competi - tion , generalist, neutrality and permanence are its basic principles.
sentences.cn: 竞争 、 通才 、 中立、常任是其基本原则,自创立以来,一直未变.

sentences.en: The positive neutrality enjoined on the force has now been overtaken by events.
sentences.cn: 要求武装力量保持绝对中立的命令现在已经被一些事件打破了。

sentences.en: Their cloak of neutrality in the Iran - Iraq war was beginning to wear a bit thin.
sentences.cn: 他们在两伊战争中表面上所采取的中立态度开始有点露馅了.

sentences.en: They had thrown their neutrality overboard in the crisis.
sentences.cn: 他们在这场危机中丢弃了中立立场。

sentences.en: They have been violently advocating neutrality.
sentences.cn: 他们一直激烈地鼓吹中立.

sentences.en: This is, of course , what the fable of money's neutrality implies.
sentences.cn: 这 当然 是货币中立这个神话所意涵的.

sentences.en: Yet in our view, the notion of "search neutrality" threatens innovation, competition and, fundamentally, your ability as a user to improve how you find information.
sentences.cn: 但在我们看来“搜索中立”这个概念威胁创新，竞争和本质上的，你作为一个用户去提高你寻找信息的能力。

sentences.en: Yet in our view, the notion of “search neutrality” threatens innovation, competition and, fundamentally,your ability as a user to improve how you find information.
sentences.cn: 但在我们看来“搜索中立”这个概念威胁创新，竞争和本质上的，你作为一个用户去提高你寻找信息的能力。

words.tran_cn: 中性的；不及物的；无性的
中立的，中性的；中立国的；非彩色的
无性动物；中性名词；阉割动物
中立国；中立者；非彩色；齿轮的空档
[化学] 中和；[化学] 中和作用；中立状态
[组织] 嗜中性粒细胞；[组织] 中性白细胞
中立化（neutralize的过去式和过去分词）
抵销；使…中和；使…无效；使…中立

trans.tran_en: the state of not supporting either side in an argument or war
